info.name: MedSync - Histórico API (Updated)
info.description: Collection atualizada para o serviço de Histórico com endpoints GraphQL e autenticação JWT

item.name: Get Medical History by Patient ID

body.raw:
{
  "query": "mutation SalvarHistorico($input: SalvarHistoricoInput!) {\n    salvarHistorico(input: $input) {\n      patient {\n        id\n        name\n        cpf\n        email\n        dateOfBirth\n      }\n      appointments {\n        id\n        appointmentDateTime\n        status\n        doctor {\n          id\n          name\n          specialty\n        }\n      }\n    }\n  }",
  "variables": {
    "input": {
      "consultaId": "{{consulta_id}}",
      "dataHora": "2024-12-15T10:00:00",
      "status": "AGENDADA",
      "observacoes": "Consulta de rotina",
      "tipoEvento": "CRIADA",
      "timestamp": "2024-12-15T10:00:00",
      "pacienteId": "{{paciente_id}}",
      "pacienteNome": "João Silva",
      "pacienteCpf": "12345678901",
      "pacienteEmail": "joao@email.com",
      "pacienteDataNascimento": "1990-01-01",
      "medicoId": "{{medico_id}}",
      "medicoNome": "Dr. Carlos",
      "medicoCpf": "98765432100",
      "medicoEmail": "carlos@email.com",
      "medicoEspecialidade": "Cardiologia",
      "usuarioId": "{{usuario_id}}",
      "usuarioNome": "Admin",
      "usuarioEmail": "admin@medsync.com",
      "usuarioRole": "ADMIN"
    }
  }
}

{
  "query": "mutation AtualizarHistorico($input: AtualizarHistoricoInput!) {\n    atualizarHistorico(input: $input) {\n      patient {\n        id\n        name\n        cpf\n        email\n        dateOfBirth\n      }\n      appointments {\n        id\n        appointmentDateTime\n        status\n        doctor {\n          id\n          name\n          specialty\n        }\n      }\n    }\n  }",
  "variables": {
